3 namespace Ubiquity\scaffolding\creators;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\scaffolding\ScaffoldController;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
7 
17 class CrudControllerCreator extends BaseControllerCreator {
18  private $resource;
19  private $crudDatas;
20  private $crudViewer;
21  private $crudEvents;
22 
23  public function __construct($crudControllerName, $resource, $crudDatas = null, $crudViewer = null, $crudEvents = null, $crudViews = null, $routePath = '') {
24  parent::__construct ( $crudControllerName, $routePath, $crudViews );
25  $this->resource = $resource;
26  $this->crudDatas = $crudDatas;
27  $this->crudViewer = $crudViewer;
28  $this->crudEvents = $crudEvents;
29  $this->templateName = 'crudController.tpl';
30  }
31 
32  public function create(ScaffoldController $scaffoldController) {
33  $this->scaffoldController = $scaffoldController;
34  $resource = $this->resource;
35  $crudControllerName = $this->controllerName;
36  $classContent = "";
37  $uses = [ ];
38  $controllerNS = $this->controllerNS;
39  $messages = [ ];
40  $routeName = $crudControllerName;
41  $scaffoldController->_createMethod ( "public", "__construct", "", "", "\n\t\tparent::__construct();\n\$this->model=\"{$resource}\";" );
42 
43  if (isset ( $this->crudDatas )) {
44  $uses [] = "use controllers\\crud\\datas\\{$crudControllerName}Datas;";
45  $uses [] = "use Ubiquity\\controllers\\crud\\CRUDDatas;";
46 
47  $classContent .= $scaffoldController->_createMethod ( "protected", "getAdminData", "", ": CRUDDatas", "\t\treturn new {$crudControllerName}Datas(\$this);" );
48  $messages [] = $this->createCRUDDatasClass ();
49  }
50 
51  if (isset ( $this->crudViewer )) {
52  $uses [] = "use controllers\\crud\\viewers\\{$crudControllerName}Viewer;";
53  $uses [] = "use Ubiquity\\controllers\\crud\\viewers\\ModelViewer;";
54 
55  $classContent .= $scaffoldController->_createMethod ( "protected", "getModelViewer", "", ": ModelViewer", "\t\treturn new {$crudControllerName}Viewer(\$this);" );
56  $messages [] = $this->createModelViewerClass ();
57  }
58  if (isset ( $this->crudEvents )) {
59  $uses [] = "use controllers\\crud\\events\\{$crudControllerName}Events;";
60  $uses [] = "use Ubiquity\\controllers\\crud\\CRUDEvents;";
61 
62  $classContent .= $scaffoldController->_createMethod ( "protected", "getEvents", "", ": CRUDEvents", "\t\treturn new {$crudControllerName}Events(\$this);" );
63  $messages [] = $this->createEventsClass ();
64  }
65 
66  if (isset ( $this->views )) {
67  $this->addViews ( $uses, $messages, $classContent );
68  }
69  if ($this->routePath != null) {
70  if (UString::isNotNull ( $this->routePath )) {
71  $routeName = $this->addRoute ( $this->routePath );
72  }
73  }
74  $uses = implode ( "\n", $uses );
75  $messages [] = $scaffoldController->_createController ( $crudControllerName, [ "%routeName%" => $routeName,"%route%" => $this->routePath,"%resource%" => $resource,"%uses%" => $uses,"%namespace%" => $controllerNS,"%baseClass%" => "\\Ubiquity\\controllers\\crud\\CRUDController","%content%" => $classContent ], $this->templateName );
76  echo implode ( "\n", $messages );
77  }
78 
79  protected function addViews(&$uses, &$messages, &$classContent) {
80  $crudControllerName = $this->controllerName;
81  $crudViews = explode ( ",", $this->views );
82  $uses [] = "use controllers\\crud\\files\\{$crudControllerName}Files;";
83  $uses [] = "use Ubiquity\\controllers\\crud\\CRUDFiles;";
84  $classContent .= $this->scaffoldController->_createMethod ( "protected", "getFiles", "", ": CRUDFiles", "\t\treturn new {$crudControllerName}Files();" );
85  $classFilesContent = [ ];
86  foreach ( $crudViews as $file ) {
87  if (isset ( ScaffoldController::$views ["CRUD"] [$file] )) {
88  $frameworkViewname = ScaffoldController::$views ["CRUD"] [$file];
89  $this->scaffoldController->createAuthCrudView ( $frameworkViewname, $crudControllerName, $file );
90  $classFilesContent [] = $this->scaffoldController->_createMethod ( "public", "getView" . ucfirst ( $file ), "", "", "\t\treturn \"" . $crudControllerName . "/" . $file . ".html\";" );
91  }
92  }
93  $messages [] = $this->createCRUDFilesClass ( implode ( "", $classFilesContent ) );
94  }
95 
96  protected function createCRUDDatasClass() {
97  $ns = $this->controllerNS . "crud\\datas";
98  $uses = "\nuse Ubiquity\\controllers\\crud\\CRUDDatas;";
99  return $this->scaffoldController->_createClass ( "class.tpl", $this->controllerName . "Datas", $ns, $uses, "extends CRUDDatas", "\t//use override/implement Methods" );
100  }
101 
102  protected function createModelViewerClass() {
103  $ns = $this->controllerNS . "crud\\viewers";
104  $uses = "\nuse Ubiquity\\controllers\\crud\\viewers\\ModelViewer;";
105  return $this->scaffoldController->_createClass ( "class.tpl", $this->controllerName . "Viewer", $ns, $uses, "extends ModelViewer", "\t//use override/implement Methods" );
106  }
107 
108  protected function createEventsClass() {
109  $ns = $this->controllerNS . "crud\\events";
110  $uses = "\nuse Ubiquity\\controllers\\crud\\CRUDEvents;";
111  return $this->scaffoldController->_createClass ( "class.tpl", $this->controllerName . "Events", $ns, $uses, "extends CRUDEvents", "\t//use override/implement Methods" );
112  }
113 
114  public function createCRUDFilesClass($classContent = "") {
115  $ns = $this->controllerNS . "crud\\files";
116  $uses = "\nuse Ubiquity\\controllers\\crud\\CRUDFiles;";
117  return $this->scaffoldController->_createClass ( "class.tpl", $this->controllerName . "Files", $ns, $uses, "extends CRUDFiles", $classContent );
118  }
119 }
